issue.title: [CF 732] Event tab lua error
issue.body:
Version: r690

3 lua errors

  1. Tick Only handle if condition is passing
  2. Tick Only handle if icon is shown
  3. Change Operator
Quote:

1x <string>:"TellMeWhen_IconEditorEventsEventSettingsContainerPassingCndt:OnClick":3: attempt to call method "GetEventSettings" (a nil value)
<string>:"*:OnClick":3: in function <string>:"*:OnClick":1
<in C code>
<string>:"*:OnClick":3: in function <string>:"*:OnClick":1

Locals:
(*temporary) = TellMeWhen_IconEditorEventsEventSettingsContainerPassingCndt {
0 = <userdata>
text = "除非下面設定的條件成功通過,否則阻止事件的觸發."
title = "僅在條件通過時觸發:"
setting = "PassingCndt"
ttHooked = 1
text = <unnamed> {}
clickinterceptor = TellMeWhen_IconEditorEventsEventSettingsContainerPassingCndtClickInterceptor {}
}
(*temporary) = "LeftButton"
(*temporary) = "LeftButton"
(*temporary) = false
(*temporary) = <func> =[C]:-1

Quote:

1x <string>:"TellMeWhen_IconEditorEventsEventSettingsContainerOnlyShown:OnClick":3: attempt to call method "GetEventSettings" (a nil value)
<string>:"*:OnClick":3: in function <string>:"*:OnClick":1
<in C code>
<string>:"*:OnClick":3: in function <string>:"*:OnClick":1

Locals:
(*temporary) = TellMeWhen_IconEditorEventsEventSettingsContainerOnlyShown {
0 = <userdata>
text = "勾選此項防止圖示在沒有顯示時觸發相關事件."
title = "僅在圖示顯示時觸發"
setting = "OnlyShown"
ttHooked = 1
text = <unnamed> {}
clickinterceptor = TellMeWhen_IconEditorEventsEventSettingsContainerOnlyShownClickInterceptor {}
}
(*temporary) = "LeftButton"
(*temporary) = "LeftButton"
(*temporary) = false
(*temporary) = <func> =[C]:-1

Quote:

1x TellMeWhen-r690\Options\TellMeWhen_Options-r690.lua:3674: attempt to index field "EventHandlerFrames" (a nil value)
TellMeWhen-r690\Options\TellMeWhen_Options-r690.lua:3674: in function "initFunction"
FrameXML\UIDropDownMenu.lua:69: in function "UIDropDownMenu_Initialize"
FrameXML\UIDropDownMenu.lua:864: in function "ToggleDropDownMenu"
<string>:"*:OnClick":1: in function <string>:"*:OnClick":1

Locals:
frame = TellMeWhen_IconEditorEventsEventSettingsContainerOperator {
0 = <userdata>
ValueLabel = TellMeWhen_IconEditorEventsEventSettingsContainerOperatorValueLabel {}
Right = TellMeWhen_IconEditorEventsEventSettingsContainerOperatorRight {}
selectedValue = "<"
Text = TellMeWhen_IconEditorEventsEventSettingsContainerOperatorText {}
Left = TellMeWhen_IconEditorEventsEventSettingsContainerOperatorLeft {}
title = "小於"
wrapTooltips = 1
Enable = <func> *:OnLoad:11
ttHooked = 1
initialize = <func> @TellMeWhen\Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:3671
Button = TellMeWhen_IconEditorEventsEventSettingsContainerOperatorButton {}
Disable = <func> *:OnLoad:7
Middle = TellMeWhen_IconEditorEventsEventSettingsContainerOperatorMiddle {}
noResize = 1
}
initFunction = <func> @TellMeWhen\Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:3671
displayMode = nil
level = 1
menuList = nil


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #732 | Raw

comments.body:
Should be all fixed in r691


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
